price: Banayakuramo izindi nyungu ndetse n’ibyo kunywa. Ese ntibashimira?
arabic: وَلَهُمۡ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُۚ أَفَلَا يَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: walahum fīhā manāfiʿu wamashāribu afalā yashkurūna
